job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: ltpgtThis position will be responsible for helping with the teams move to automation This will include both Infrastructure as Code and SecDevOpsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis individual will be responsible for maintaining existing code creating new automation and corresponding documentationltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe position will focus Application Delivery Networking which includes Load Balancing Smart DNS and Security OfferingsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequired Qualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligt2 years of development and maintenance experience in Ansible OR Towerltligtltligt2 years of development and maintenance experience in Gitltligtltligt2 years of development and maintenance experience in REST InterfacesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPreferred QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtIt would be nice if the candidate had experience with Load Balancing Networking or Private Key InfrastructureltligtltligtExperience inltligtltligtCloud platform experience AWSAZUREGCPltligtltligtDeclarative Onboarding using AS3ltligtltligtDatabase ExperienceltligtltligtOctopusltligtltligtBashltligtltligtVSCodePythonPHPltligtltligtNodejsltligtltligtReactjsltligtltligtSNOWltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtEducationltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtA degree in information technology or matching job experienceltligtltulgt
